title: The Christmas We Moved to the Barn
description: Taffy' s all set for a warm and cozy Christmas with her family, but then she' s notified on Christmas Eve that they' ve got to move out of their house by midnight. Don' t worry Taffy, her two daughters, and their twelve animals--an unusual and closeknit family--won' t let the bad news get them down.Trekking back and forth across the snowy landscape, they move all of their belongings into an abandoned barn. And in the true spirit of the season, they clean up the barn, light the woodstove, hang their stockings, and put up their tree. It turns out to be a Christmas they' ll never forget.
author: Cooper Edens
